verses.text: I waited patiently \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w And|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* inclined \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* me, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* heard \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* up \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* horrible pit, \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* miry clay; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* set \w my|strong="H8085"\w* feet \w upon|strong="H5186"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* established \w my|strong="H8085"\w* goings.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w hath|strong="H7272"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* new song \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mouth, \w even|strong="H5921"\w* praise \w unto|strong="H5927"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God: Many \w shall|strong="H7272"\w* see \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* fear, \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H7272"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w maketh|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* trust, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w respecteth|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* proud, \w nor|strong="H3372"\w* such \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* aside \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w lies|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wonderful works \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H7760"\w* hast \w done|strong="H7760"\w*, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* thoughts \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* us-ward: \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* order \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H7760"\w*; \w If|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w and|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* numbered.

\w Sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* hast \w no|strong="H6213"\w* delight \w in|strong="H3068"\w*; \w Mine|strong="H1696"\w* ears hast \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* opened: Burnt-offering \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sin-offering hast \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* required.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* said \w I|strong="H3808"\w*, Lo, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am come; \w In|strong="H2654"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* roll \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* book \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5930"\w* written \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w me|strong="H7592"\w*:

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* delight \w to|strong="H5921"\w* do \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5612"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God; Yea, \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* law \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart.

\w I|strong="H8432"\w* \w have|strong="H2654"\w* proclaimed glad tidings \w of|strong="H8432"\w* righteousness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* assembly; Lo, \w I|strong="H8432"\w* \w will|strong="H7522"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* refrain \w my|strong="H6213"\w* lips, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* knowest.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hid \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* within \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w declared|strong="H3045"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* salvation; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* concealed \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* lovingkindness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

Withhold \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w thy|strong="H3680"\w* tender \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3680"\w* \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w thy|strong="H3680"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w* \w continually|strong="H3820"\w* preserve \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* innumerable evils \w have|strong="H3068"\w* compassed \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w about|strong="H4480"\w*; \w Mine|strong="H4480"\w* iniquities \w have|strong="H3068"\w* overtaken \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H3607"\w*; \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* pleased, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w Make|strong="H7200"\w* haste \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* shame \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded together \w That|strong="H3068"\w* seek after \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w to|strong="H3068"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H3068"\w*: Let \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H3068"\w* backward \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dishonor \w That|strong="H3068"\w* \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hurt.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* desolate \w by|strong="H7451"\w* reason \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* \w That|strong="H5315"\w* say \w unto|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, Aha, aha.

Let \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H8074"\w* seek thee rejoice \w and|strong="H8074"\w* be glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee: Let such \w as|strong="H5921"\w* love \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* salvation say continually, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* be magnified.

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* poor \w and|strong="H3068"\w* needy; \add Yet\add* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thinketh upon \w me|strong="H1245"\w*: Thou \w art|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H8668"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* deliverer; \w Make|strong="H1431"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* tarrying, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
